```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(rio)
library(haven)
library(psych)
library(GPArotation)


df <- read_sav("")

#in case we want to exclude a variable:

data <- subset(df, select = -c(Country))

fa.parallel(data)


EFA_fit <- fa(data, #data
              nfactors = 5, #number of factors
              rotate = "oblimin", #rotation
              fm = "ml") #math
```
